meanings.definition: Aeciospores: spores produced by aecia, a type of fruiting body in certain fungi.
meanings.sent1: The aeciospores were released into the air by the fungus.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study aeciospores to understand fungal reproduction.
meanings.sent3: The aeciospores decided to have a dance party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The aeciospores spread like whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The aeciospores shimmered like tiny jewels under the microscope.
